item.title: About
item.description:
I started this blog on month of July I wanted to have a place where I could air out my ideas and share with other datascientists worldwide.

I am an Actuarial Science graduate with knowledge in Python and R program.

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask me on Twitter.
